title: #6 - Patrik Schumacher
itunes:title: #6 - Patrik Schumacher
description: Patrik Schumacher is Principal of Zaha Hadid Architects and has written and lectured extensively on architectural theory, most notably in his book 'The Autopoiesis of Architecture'. In conversation with Bruce Buckland, Director of Buckland Architects.
